```{r}
setwd(".../Email_IBM")
```

```{r Install Packages}
install.packages("dplyr") #Data Manipulation
install.packages("tidyr") #Data Manipulation
```

```{r Read the data}
data <- read.csv("Data.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
data <- data[c(3:39)]
```

```{r Subset the data}
data1 <- dplyr::filter(data, year == "2018", mailing_name_short != "ReturningGuest", mailing_name_short != "ExploreMore", mailing_template != "AC", mailing_template != "NW", mailing_template != "WB", mailing_template != "TH", mailing_template != "PV")
```

```{r Understand the variables}
summary(data1$mailing_template)
summary(data1$mailing_name_short)
```
